languages.text: "Ищете? Абсурдно. Ты ведь даже не представляешь, в поисках чего находишься, мирян{mf|ин|ка}. Ты ищешь человека, а Амарнат никогда им не был... не был одним человеком".
"Looking? How absurd. You lack the very concept of what you are looking for, lay{mf||wo}man. You expect to find a man, and Amarnat never was one... he was never one person."
languages.original_text: "Ищете? Абсурдно. Ты ведь даже не представляешь, в поисках чего находишься, мирян{mf|ин|ка}. Ты ищешь человека, а Амарнат никогда им не был... не был одним человеком".

traits.locale_text: "Looking? How absurd. You lack the very concept of what you are looking for, lay{mf||wo}man. You expect to find a man, and Amarnat never was one... he was never one person."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: "Looking? How absurd. You lack the very concept of what you are looking for, lay{mf||wo}man. You expect to find a man, and Amarnat never was one... he was never one person."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: "Looking? How absurd. You lack the very concept of what you are looking for, lay{mf||wo}man. You expect to find a man, and Amarnat never was one... he was never one person."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: 「探している？ばかなことを。何を探しているかの概念そのものが欠けているぞ、俗人め。ひとりの人間を探すつもりだろうが、アマルナトがひとりということはない…アマルナトは一個人ではないのだ」
languages.original_text: "Looking? How absurd. You lack the very concept of what you are looking for, lay{mf||wo}man. You expect to find a man, and Amarnat never was one... he was never one person."

traits.locale_text: 「探している？ばかなことを。何を探しているかの概念そのものが欠けているぞ、俗人め。ひとりの人間を探すつもりだろうが、アマルナトがひとりということはない…アマルナトは一個人ではないのだ」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “寻找？何等荒谬。你根本不知道你在找什么，外行人。你以为你要找的是个人，可阿玛纳特从来都不是……他从来都不是什么‘人’。”
languages.original_text: "Looking? How absurd. You lack the very concept of what you are looking for, lay{mf||wo}man. You expect to find a man, and Amarnat never was one... he was never one person."

traits.locale_text: “寻找？何等荒谬。你根本不知道你在找什么，外行人。你以为你要找的是个人，可阿玛纳特从来都不是……他从来都不是什么‘人’。”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Vous cherchez ? C'est absurde. Vous n'avez pas la moindre idée de ce que vous cherchez vraiment, profane. Vous espérez trouver un homme, alors qu'Amarnat n'a jamais été un homme... Il n'a jamais été une seule personne. »
languages.original_text: "Looking? How absurd. You lack the very concept of what you are looking for, lay{mf||wo}man. You expect to find a man, and Amarnat never was one... he was never one person."

traits.locale_text: « Vous cherchez ? C'est absurde. Vous n'avez pas la moindre idée de ce que vous cherchez vraiment, profane. Vous espérez trouver un homme, alors qu'Amarnat n'a jamais été un homme... Il n'a jamais été une seule personne. »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «¿Buscando? Qué absurdo. No sabes lo que estás buscando exactamente, profan{mf|o|a}. Esperas encontrar a un hombre, y Amarnat nunca lo ha sido... ni siquiera ha sido una persona».
languages.original_text: "Looking? How absurd. You lack the very concept of what you are looking for, lay{mf||wo}man. You expect to find a man, and Amarnat never was one... he was never one person."

traits.locale_text: «¿Buscando? Qué absurdo. No sabes lo que estás buscando exactamente, profan{mf|o|a}. Esperas encontrar a un hombre, y Amarnat nunca lo ha sido... ni siquiera ha sido una persona».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Suchen? Wie absurd. Ihr kennt nicht einmal das grundlegende Konzept dessen, wonach Ihr sucht, {mf|Laie|Laiin}. Ihr erwartet, einen Mann zu finden, doch Amarnat war nie ein Mann ... er war nie eine einzelne Person."
languages.original_text: "Looking? How absurd. You lack the very concept of what you are looking for, lay{mf||wo}man. You expect to find a man, and Amarnat never was one... he was never one person."

traits.locale_text: "Suchen? Wie absurd. Ihr kennt nicht einmal das grundlegende Konzept dessen, wonach Ihr sucht, {mf|Laie|Laiin}. Ihr erwartet, einen Mann zu finden, doch Amarnat war nie ein Mann ... er war nie eine einzelne Person."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Arıyor musunuz? Ne kadar da absürt. Ne aradığından bihaber bir avamsın. Birini bulmayı bekliyorsun, Amarnat ise hiçbir zaman birisi olmadı. Asla tek bir kişi olmadı."
languages.original_text: "Looking? How absurd. You lack the very concept of what you are looking for, lay{mf||wo}man. You expect to find a man, and Amarnat never was one... he was never one person."

traits.locale_text: "Arıyor musunuz? Ne kadar da absürt. Aradığın şeyin konseptinden bile bihaber bir avamsın. Birini bulmayı bekliyorsun ama Amarnat hiçbir zaman öyle bir şey olmamıştır. Hiçbir zaman tek bir kişi değildi."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
